field.name: category
field.label: Select a category
field.description: Apply this object type to articles in selected category

field.name: custom_desc_type
field.label: Description Type
field.description: How should the Open Graph Description (og:desc) be generated? From metatag information or article text

field.name: custom_desc_length
field.label: Description Length
field.description: Number of words or characters from beginning of article text to use as the Open Graph description. This option is only used if 'Intro Words' or 'Intro Characters' is selected for Description Type.

field.name: custom_image_type
field.label: Image Type
field.description: How should the Open Graph Image (og:image) be generated? From first article image, category image or a custom provided image

field.name: custom_image_path
field.label: Custom Image Path
field.description: This should be a URL to the image and is only used if 'Custom Image' is selected for Image Type.
